data.text:
Vince Vaughn, known for his acting roles, has invested in the Coachella Valley Scorpions team in the National Pickleball League. This acquisition positions him as a major player in the professional pickleball space in the growing Champions Division tailored for players aged 50 and above. The league's 2024 championship games will be shown on CBS later this year, tapping into the rising popularity of this sport among audiences. Interested in more sports-related business insights? Visit the National Pickleball League's website for updates. What do you think about celebrities investing in sports teams like pickleball? Are you following the rise of pickleball's popularity? #VinceVaughn #Pickleball #SportsBusiness #NPL

Discover powerful strategies to stay calm under pressure on the pickleball court with Dr. Alex Auerbach, former Senior Director of Wellness and Development for the Toronto Raptors. In this episode, Dr. Auerbach shares proven techniques used by elite athletes to manage nerves and maintain focus in high-stakes pickleball tournaments. Learn how to: - Reframe nerves as excitement and fuel for your pickleball performance - Use breathing techniques to regulate your nervous system during intense rallies - Keep a balanced perspective during critical moments of the game - Practice and simulate pressure scenarios for better preparation on the court #pickleball #pickleballmindset #mentalskills #aim7 #blueprintpodcast

Ever heard of the trivela pass? It's a dazzling move where the outside of the foot is used to hit the ball, creating curves and pinpoint accuracy. Perfect for bending shots or delivering precise crosses, it's a technique favored by many top footballers. Are you Ready to elevate your game and learn more skills? Like, Share and Follow this page for more expert insights and tips on how to up your game #Trivela #FootballSkills #BallBusiness #FootballMarketing
